name: Battery Pack Coolant
description: Coolant for battery thermal management systems.

name: 12V Auxiliary Battery
description: 12V battery used for accessories and vehicle electronics.

name: Indicator/Direction Lamp Bulb
description: Indicator / direction (turn signal) lamp bulb (LED or filament types). Specify fitting and polarity where applicable.

name: Brake Fluid
description: Hydraulic brake fluid (DOT 4/DOT 5.1) for regenerative braking systems.

name: Tyres/Tires
description: Tyre specification and recommended pressures; low rolling resistance tyres common.

name: Cabin/Pollen Filter
description: Passenger compartment air filter.

name: Windscreen Washer Fluid
description: Washer fluid for windscreen/windshield.

name: Wiper Blades
description: Front and rear wiper blades.

name: A/C Filter
description: Filter for HVAC and heat pump systems.

name: Coolant Pump
description: Pump for coolant circulation in battery/thermal systems.

name: Thermal Interface Materials
description: Gaskets, seals, or pads used in battery modules.

name: Traction Battery Pack
description: High-voltage battery pack (modular or complete pack replacement).

name: Battery Management System (BMS) Components
description: Sensors, controllers, or modules for battery monitoring and management.

name: Electric Motor Coolant
description: Coolant for electric motor(s) and power electronics.

name: Reduction Gear Oil
description: Oil for EV reduction gearbox (single-speed transmission).

name: On-Board Charger (OBC)
description: AC-to-DC charger integrated in the vehicle.

name: DC-DC Converter
description: Converts high-voltage DC to 12V DC for auxiliary systems.

name: Charging Port / Inlet
description: Vehicle-side charging connector (Type 1, Type 2, CCS, CHAdeMO, Tesla).

name: Charging Cable
description: Portable charging cable (Mode 2 or Mode 3).

name: High-Voltage Cables / Harnesses
description: Orange high-voltage wiring and connectors.

name: Inverter / Power Electronics Coolant
description: Coolant for the power inverter and control modules.

name: Heat Pump Refrigerant
description: Refrigerant for HVAC heat pump systems (often R-1234yf).

name: Battery Cooling System Hoses
description: Coolant hoses for battery thermal management.

name: Brake Pads (Front)
description: Front brake pads; often last longer due to regenerative braking.

name: Brake Pads (Rear)
description: Rear brake pads.

name: Brake Discs/Rotors (Front)
description: Front brake discs/rotors.

name: Brake Discs/Rotors (Rear)
description: Rear brake discs/rotors.

name: Brake Caliper Seals / Rebuild Kits
description: Seal kits for brake calipers.

name: Headlight Bulbs
description: Headlight bulbs (often LED modules in modern EVs).

name: Taillight/Brake Light Bulbs
description: Bulbs or LED modules for rear lights.

name: Interior Bulbs
description: Bulbs for interior lighting.

name: Number Plate/Registration Plate Bulbs
description: Bulbs for license plate illumination.

name: Shock Absorbers/Struts
description: Suspension dampers; some EVs have adaptive/smart suspension.

name: Wheel Bearings
description: Wheel bearing/hub assemblies.

name: Wheel Nuts/Bolts
description: Wheel securing hardware.

name: Locking Wheel Nut Key
description: Security key for locking wheel nuts.

name: Fuses (High Voltage)
description: High-voltage fuses for battery and power systems.

name: Fuses (Low Voltage)
description: Standard 12V fuses.

name: Relays
description: 12V relays for various systems.

name: Dielectric Grease
description: For electrical connectors and high-voltage connections.

name: Electrical Contact Cleaner
description: Cleaner for electrical connectors and sensors.

name: Battery Terminal Cleaner / Protector
description: For 12V battery terminals.

name: Thermal Paste / Compound
description: Thermal interface material for power electronics cooling.

name: Wheel Weights
description: Balancing weights for wheels.

name: Tire Valve Stems
description: Valve stems for tire pressure monitoring systems (TPMS).

name: TPMS Sensors
description: Tire pressure monitoring sensors and seals.

name: Car Wash Soap (EV-safe)
description: pH-balanced soap safe for EV charging ports and sensors.

name: Wax / Polish
description: Paint protection products.

name: Interior Cleaner
description: Cleaner for vegan leather, fabric, or other EV-specific materials.

name: Glass Cleaner
description: For windows and touchscreens.

name: Tire Shine
description: Tire dressing.

name: Microfiber Towels
description: Lint-free towels for cleaning.

name: Wash Mitt
description: Soft mitt for washing.

name: Charging Port Cover
description: Protective cover for charging port.

name: Charging Port Light Bulb
description: Light for charging port illumination.

name: HVAC Desiccant Bags
description: Desiccant for heat pump/dryer systems.

name: Battery Cooling Plate
description: Cooling plate or cold plate for battery modules.

name: Pedestrian Warning Speaker
description: External speaker for AVAS (Acoustic Vehicle Alerting System).
